Agencies across National Highways Policy Guidelines thereof. The Policy Guidelines regarding grant of permission for the construction of ROB/ RUBs proposed by Railways for a new rail corridor OR construction of flyover / underpasses/ foot over bridges etc, proposed by State/ Central Government Agencies/ Public Sector across the existing NH link constituting way leave facility or crossing structure (WLF or CS) were circulated vide NHAI Circular No. 71/2010 dated 04.01.2011. 2 _ Requests have been received  from the State Government/ State Government Agency for waiver of charges for Leave facilities/ easement rights" for crossing of NH by SH/ State roads on reciprocal basis. 3 NHAI is also taking up construction of new NHs and widening of existing NHs throughout the country and there will be a number Of cases when these new NHs or the widening of existing NHs will have to cross over State Highways/ Roads. 4_ In view of the above, it has been decided to waive of charges for Leave facilities/ easement rights" for crossing of NH by SH/ State roads on reciprocal basis with State Government/ State Government Agency. 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 3 (Sanjay Kumar Patei} 0 General Manager (Coord.)
